original_text: I, the Lord, know all the wrong things that you have done. They are very many and they are very bad. You are cruel to good people. You take bribes to tell lies. Sometimes a person gives money to you to make you tell lies. As a result, poor people do not receive justice. I, the Lord, know all the wrong things that you have done. They are very many and they are very bad. You are cruel to good people. You take bribes to tell lies. Sometimes a person gives money to you to make you tell lies. As a result, poor people do not receive justice.
korean_text: 너희의 허물이 많고 죄악이 무거움을 내가 아노라 너희는 의인을 학대하며 뇌물을 받고 성문에서 가난한 자를 억울하게 하는 자로다

sentences.original_text: I, the Lord, know all the wrong things that you have done.
sentences.korean_translation: 나 주께서는 너희가 행한 모든 악한 일을 알고 있다.

sentences.original_text: You are cruel to good people.
You take bribes to tell lies.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 거짓말을 하기 위해 뇌물을 받는다.

sentences.original_text: Sometimes a person gives money to you
sentences.korean_translation: 때로는 어떤 사람이 너희에게 돈을 준다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, poor people do not receive justice.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 가난한 사람들은 공정을 받지 못한다.
